channel.title: Steakhouse on This is Wei
channel.description: Recent content in Steakhouse on This is Wei

item.title: Steaks
item.description: People normally are going to steakhouses to celebrate a milestone in their life or a special occasion. I am indifferent except I do go to steakhouses from time to time to meet with friends. [Peter Luger(https://www.yelp.com/biz/peter-luger-brooklyn-2?hrid=k2FntEWZpoH5q5G-dqHmBg) is definitely one of my favors. This time, my husband and I decided to take his brother and sister-in-law to Peter Luger for celebrating 2018 and some renovation work that was done by his brother in our place.
